confidentiality.notes: described a detailed plan to circumvent US Navy computer security by installing software on his restricted computer system that would enable him to copy documents without causing a security alert;  also provided the undercover FBI agent with four Computer Aided Drawings of a US nuclear aircraft carrier downloaded from the Navy Nuclear Propulsion Information system.

discovery_notes: FBI undercover agent posed as an Egyptian intelligence officer;  received plan to circumvent US Navy computer security by installing software on restricted computer system that would enable him to copy documents without causing a security alert.;  received four Computer Aided Drawings of a US nuclear aircraft carrier downloaded from the Navy Nuclear Propulsion Information system.
notes: civilian US naval engineer attempted espionage, after passing military technology secrets to an FBI undercover agent posing as an Egyptian intelligence officer.
summary: Navy engineer gets 11 years for attempted espionage
